instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Internet . Tap the MORE icon. Scroll to and tap Settings . Tap Privacy . Tap Delete personal data . Select the desired check box. Clear the cache Clear cookies, site data Clear browsing history Tap DELETE .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Internet . Tap the Menu icon. Tap New Window to add a window.
From the the Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Camera . Tap Settings . Select Storage location .
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Internet . Tap the MORE icon. Scroll to and tap Settings . Tap Advanced . Move the slider Turn on JavaScript to ON or OFF.
